SELECT TBMPCR.PDF_INFO_ID , TBMPCR.PDF_CNT , TBMPCR.UT_ID
, TBMPIM.SELR_USIS_ID , TBMFIM.BPLC_NM AS SELR_USIS_NAME
, TBMPIM.PDF_STTS_ID , TBMCCDPSI.COM_CD_NM AS PDF_STTS_NAME
, TBMPIM.AGEN_INF_ID , TBMPIM.PDF_NM , TBMPIM.PDF_PGRS_YN
, TBMPSL.PDF_PRC , TBMPSL.SALE_PRC , TBMPSL.PRC_DSCS_YN , TBMPSL.ORDN_QTY_LMTN_USYN , TBMPSL.ORDN_MNMM_QTY , TBMPSL.ORDN_MXMM_QTY_YN , TBMPSL.ORDN_MXMM_QTY , TBMPSL.COM_PRCUT_ID
, TBMCCDCPI.COM_CD_NM AS COM_PRCUT_NAME
, TBMPFR.FILE_ID , TBMPFR.FILE_ID AS IMG_FILE_ID
, 'N' AS SELECTED_FLG
FROM TB_BOX_MKT_PDF_CART_R TBMPCR INNER JOIN TB_BOX_MKT_PDF_INF_M TBMPIM ON TBMPIM.PDF_INFO_ID = TBMPCR.PDF_INFO_ID LEFT JOIN TB_BOX_MKT_FFPC_INF_M TBMFIM ON TBMFIM.UTLINSTT_ID = TBMPIM.SELR_USIS_ID LEFT JOIN TB_BOX_MKT_COM_CD_D TBMCCDPSI ON TBMCCDPSI.COM_CD_ID = TBMPIM.PDF_STTS_ID LEFT JOIN TB_BOX_MKT_PDF_SAL_L TBMPSL ON TBMPSL.PDF_INFO_ID = TBMPIM.PDF_INFO_ID LEFT JOIN TB_BOX_MKT_COM_CD_D TBMCCDCPI ON TBMCCDCPI.COM_CD_ID = TBMPSL.COM_PRCUT_ID LEFT JOIN TB_BOX_MKT_PDF_FIE_R TBMPFR ON TBMPFR.PDF_INFO_ID = TBMPSL.PDF_INFO_ID AND FILE_PTRN_ID = #{filePtrnId} AND TBMPFR.INFO_SQN = 1
WHERE 1 = 1 AND TBMPIM.DEL_YN = 'N' AND TBMPIM.PDF_PGRS_YN = 'Y' /* 진열함 */ AND TBMPCR.PUCS_USIS_ID = #{pucsUsisId} AND TBMPCR.PUCS_ID = #{pucsId}
AND TBMPCR.PDF_INFO_ID = #{pdfInfoId}

SELECT CASE WHEN SUM(1) IS NULL THEN 0 ELSE SUM(1) END
FROM TB_BOX_MKT_PDF_CART_R TBMPCR
INNER JOIN TB_BOX_MKT_PDF_INF_M TBMPIM ON TBMPIM.PDF_INFO_ID = TBMPCR.PDF_INFO_ID
WHERE 1 = 1 AND TBMPCR.PUCS_USIS_ID = #{utlinsttId} AND TBMPCR.PUCS_ID = #{loginUserId} AND TBMPIM.DEL_YN = 'N'
